title: PlayStation's Big New Studio Acquisition - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.08.21
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about PlayStation big new acquisition of Firesprite, Avengers roadmap, and a BUNCH of reviews that just dropped.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is live right now and it’s a HUGE REVIEW episode. We’ve played Life is Strange True Colors, Warioware: Get It Together, AND The Artful Escape. Tim and Greg have new Games of The Year. It’s an episode you need to check out and it’s up right now on Youtube.com/KinaaFunnyGames and Podcast services around the globe.
Also a reminder: It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Remember, there’s a PlayStation Showcase THURSDAY at 1 pm PT, and we’ll be reacting LIVE to it on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:00 - Avengers Roadmap Revealed (This is embargoed until 10 am PT in case anyone is looking early.)
00:23:20 - PlayStation has acquired a new game studio
00:36:00 -  Ad
00:39:30 - Whatever happened with the Bluepoint acquisition? - Best Friends Q:Ignacio Rojas
00:46:00 - Review Round Ups Galore
01:06:45 - Out today
01:09:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
